step1: Upload the document you want to sign.
step2: Enter your name for the signature.
step3: Click 'Send for Signing' to initiate the signing process.
step4: Click 'Sign Now' to open the signing window.
step5: Follow the instructions to complete the signing.

dos: Face is well lit without any shadow and is in the center of the frame

donts: There is a glare on your glasses
Eyes closed during the recording session

whyThisMatters.title: Why This Matters
whyThisMatters.intro: In property transactions, especially those done remotely, it‚Äôs crucial to ensure that the {{seller}} is willingly and knowingly participating in the sale. In India, if a seller later claims they were {{coerced}}, the sale can be challenged in court ‚Äî even years later.
issues: Fraud or impersonation using fake fingerprints or documents
Regret after undervalued sales, especially if land prices spike
Disputes within families over ancestral property
whyThisMatters.conclusion: Our system captures {{videoConsent}}, uses {{emotionAnalysis}}, and {{digitalSignatures}} to confirm voluntary action‚Äîboosting trust and reducing legal loopholes.
